channel.title: NPC Talking
channel.description: How do i make an NPC thats already talking Say something else? im using figmentscape one.

item.title: NPC Talking
item.dc:creator: @gibsondude gibsondude
item.description:
@gibsondude wrote:

ok a few questions.

  1. i edited the text then i exited out of it and selected save changes but when i loged on it was still saying the old text.

  2. How do i edit the chatbar stuff (like it says to go to the website and sign up for membership

3.How do i make it so every player who logs in is a member.

  1. How do i add a command i have the code i just dont know how to add it.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Talking
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ok go under npchandler.java

and search for the text that its saying

example:
its saying “join fourms @ lbhaldkfjal.com!”

so u would search for join fourms @ lbhaldkfjal.com!
and just change wat it says atm 2 watever you want
